name: Wevtutil Recon
description: Detects usage of the wevtutil utility to perform reconnaissance
false_positives: Legitmate usage of the utility by administrators to query the event log
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\wevtutil.exe AND process.command_line:(*\ qe\ * OR *\ query\-events\ *) AND process.command_line:(*Microsoft\-Windows\-TerminalServices\-LocalSessionManager\/Operational* OR *Microsoft\-Windows\-Terminal\-Services\-RemoteConnectionManager\/Operational*))`
